section.title: general
section.para: This attribute specifies the normalization to apply for general size restrictions. Only the normalization forms C and D as specified by the Unicode Consortium are supported, see Unicode Standard Annex #15.

row.entry: No additional normalization SHOULD be done, content SHOULD be used as represented in the document. It is possible that other Agents have already done some type of normalization when modifying content. This means that this setting could give different results depending on what Agents are used to perform a specific action on the XLIFF document.
Normalization Form C MUST be used
Normalization Form D MUST be used
